welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Fountainebleau! Known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and quaint shops, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various shops and restaurants for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and corporate jet traffic, offering luxurious amenities and services for its clients.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport houses the check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest terminal at FLL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The original terminal at FLL, currently undergoing renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A popular terminal at FLL, serving many major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at FLL, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free option for basic internet access and a paid option for high-speed access.
